attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Liz Smith a acting legend for 30 years deserves to be a Dame.
She has been in 
The Royale Family and The Vicar of Dibley to name a few.
So make Liz Smith a Dame Please.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
